meanings.sent1: The subfreezing weather made the pond icy.
meanings.sent2: The subfreezing temperatures required everyone to bundle up.
meanings.sent3: The subfreezing wind turned my nose red!
meanings.sent4: Her subfreezing glare could freeze anyone in their tracks.
meanings.sent5: The subfreezing chill seeped into my bones.

meanings.sent1: We wore extra layers to stay warm in the subfreezing cold.
meanings.sent2: The subfreezing air nipped at our cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The subfreezing weather made the snow sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: His subfreezing touch sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The subfreezing night was silent and still.
